post.title: Can God Create a Rock So Heavy that He Cannot Lift it - Answer

body:
If it went 1 3 2, then AU 1 = 1, AU 3 = 2, AU 2 = 3 

AU1 + AU 1 = AU 3 = 2

1 + 1 = 2 = AU 3

The point is, the reality is the same no matter what you name the concepts. One and One equal Two, even if One is named Purple and Two is named BigBlackPenis.

Purple = 1; BigBlackPenis = 2

Purple + Purple = BigBlackPenis = 2 = AU 3 = 1+1 = AU 1+1
body_html:
If it went 1 3 2, then AU 1 = 1, AU 3 = 2, AU 2 = 3

AU1 + AU 1 = AU 3 = 2

1 + 1 = 2 = AU 3

The point is, the reality is the same no matter what you name the concepts. One and One equal Two, even if One is named Purple and Two is named BigBlackPenis.

Purple = 1; BigBlackPenis = 2

Purple + Purple = BigBlackPenis = 2 = AU 3 = 1+1 = AU 1+1

parent.body:
If it went 1 3 2, then AU 1 = 1, AU 3 = 2, AU 2 = 3 

AU1 + AU 1 = AU 3 = 2

1 + 1 = 2 = AU 3

The point is, the reality is the same no matter what you name the concepts. One and One equal Two, even if One is named Purple and Two is named BigBlackPenis.

Purple = 1; BigBlackPenis = 2

Purple + Purple = BigBlackPenis = 2 = AU 3 = 1+1 = AU 1+1
